name: Jewelry Shop
description:
Welcome to JewelryShop! Are You a young seeker of precious diamonds? Do you want to get rich? You're in the right place! There's one condition... you have to be fast! Choose carefully you don't have much time...

JewelryShop is a game in which you most match (minimum 3) stones of the same color horizontally or vertically. Breaking stone releases diamond. There's 75 levels with different degrees of difficulty.To complete level you need to collect secified number of diamonds (this information is provided at the beginning of each level). There are 3 types of gameplay: limited time, limited moves, specified number of points that need to be earned additionaly to complete level.

Start yor journey now! Get the best score and share it via score table! Good luck!
